SELECT m.id id, m.parent_id parentId, m.create_time createTime, m.title title, m.LEVEL LEVEL, m.sort sort, m.NAME NAME, m.icon icon, m.hidden hidden FROM t_sys_admin_role_relation arr LEFT JOIN t_sys_role r ON arr.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN t_sys_role_menu_relation rmr ON r.id = rmr.role_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_menu m ON rmr.menu_id = m.id WHERE arr.admin_id = #{adminId}
AND m.id IS NOT NULL AND m.deleted = 0 GROUP BY m.id

SELECT m.id id, m.parent_id parentId, m.create_time createTime, m.title title, m.LEVEL level, m.sort sort, m.NAME name, m.icon icon, m.hidden hidden FROM t_sys_menu m LEFT JOIN t_sys_role_menu_relation rmr ON m.id = rmr.menu_id WHERE m.deleted = 0 AND rmr.deleted = 0 AND role_id = #{roleId} GROUP BY m.id

SELECT r.id id, r.create_time createTime, r.`name` `name`, r.url url, r.description description, r.category_id categoryId FROM t_sys_role_resource_relation rrr LEFT JOIN t_sys_resource r ON rrr.resource_id = r.id WHERE rrr.role_id = #{roleId} AND rrr.deleted = 0 AND r.deleted = 0
